Package com.madhura.fileHandling.ness.contoller

Class FileByFileSystemController

java.lang.Object
com.madhura.fileHandling.ness.contoller.FileByFileSystemController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/file")
public class FileByFileSystemController
extends java.lang.Object
This is the APIclass used to store/download single/multiple files.
Author:
Madhura
See Also:
http://localhost/9761/file

      @Autowired private FileByFileSystemService fileService

  • Method Details

    • SingleFileUpload

      @PostMapping("/single/upload") public FileResponse SingleFileUpload​(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file) throws java.io.IOException
      This is the method used to store single file in local system.
      Parameters:
      file - please provide key as file and select the file you need to upload.
      Returns:
      FileResponse class where you can find uploaded file details
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException if file not selected properly, not select any file
      See Also:
      http://localhost/9761/file//single/upload

    • downloadSingleFile

      @GetMapping("/download/{fileName}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> downloadSingleFile​(@PathVariable java.lang.String fileName, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      This is method used to download single file from the localFile system.
      Parameters:
      fileName - please provide your file name along with url like http://localhost:9761//file//downloa/?fileName=real nav.html
      request - it is HttpServletRequest contains all request information. Here used to get MediaType.
      Returns:
      Status,ResponseEntity,your downloaded file
      See Also:
      http://localhost/9761/file//download/{fileName}

    • multiFileUpload

      @PostMapping("/multifile/upload") public java.util.List<FileResponse> multiFileUpload​(@RequestParam("files") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile[] files)
      This is the method used to upload multiple files in local file System.
      Parameters:
      files - please give key as files, select multiple files you need to upload
      Returns:
      list of FileResponse class where you can find upload files details
      See Also:
      http://localhost/9761/file///multifile/upload

      Here iterating of Arrays for every iteration you upload single file. Atlast you get list of file responses

    • multiFileDownload

      @GetMapping("/zipdownload") public void multiFileDownload​(@RequestParam("fileName") java.lang.String[] files, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws java.io.IOException
      This is the method used to download multiple files as Zip format.
      Parameters:
      files - please provide filenames which you need to download along with url
      response - response status
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - it gives IOException when something wrong in reading files etc
